properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Fernandina Beach to St. Augustine FL out 20 NM; Waters from Fernandina Beach to St. Augustine FL from 20 to 60 NM; Waters from St. Augustine to Flagler Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM; Coastal waters from St. Augustine to Flagler Beach FL out 20 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 19 at 3:25PM EST until February 21 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville FL
properties.description:
* WHAT...North northeast winds increasing to 20 to 30 kt with
gusts up to 35 kt, and seas increasing to 8 to 12 feet expected.
Gale conditions become possible late Thursday night through
Friday night.

* WHERE...All Northeast Florida coastal waters from Fernandina
Beach FL to Flagler Beach FL out to 60 NM.

* WHEN...From 6 PM Thursday to 3 AM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THURSDAY TO 3 AM EST FRIDAY
